title: Jason Fried: The Basecamp Founder on Bypassing Perverted Growth for Profitability
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Jason Fried, Founder and CEO of Basecamp, talks about the (rare) art of making more money than you spend instead of aiming for growth at all costs.
